ai.summary: A short, easy coastal stroll in Barmouth along the Dinas Oleu area, about 2.3 km round trip. The route offers sea views, varied coastal surfaces, and a gentle grade suitable for families and beginners.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly coastal paths with a mix of paved sections, compact gravel, and a few stairs. Expect some uneven or slippery patches, particularly after rain, and exposure to sea winds near the cliff edges.
ai.safety_notes: - Stay clear of cliff edges and avoid leaning over railings. - Check tides and weather before starting; the estuary area can be exposed to strong winds. - Wear sturdy footwear with good grip and bring a waterproof layer. - Keep dogs and children under close supervision. - Carry water, sun protection in sunny weather, and a charged phone for emergencies.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and summer; be prepared for wind and rain in autumn and winter.

seo.title: Dinas Oleu Walk, Barmouth – Easy 2.3 km Coastal Walk
seo.meta_description: Explore the Dinas Oleu Walk in Barmouth, a 2.3 km easy coastal route with estuary views and family-friendly paths. Terrain, safety tips, and suggested gear included.
seo.h1: Dinas Oleu Walk, Barmouth – Easy 2.3 km Coastal Walk
